presentation: I am ULRICH ARMEL TCHATONG , application developer with 06 years of professional experience in the field of software engineering. Currently working for ITGStore Consulting where I hold the position of Full-Stack Developer, I specialized in Java (Spring Boot), Python (Django) in Back-end and Angular in Frontend technologies.
